definition: to comment/a point by point commentary

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
Meituan-Dianping, China's largest service-focused e-commerce platform

sentences.english: For example, Yelp reviews are too long - especially in "the day and age of Twitter," they write on their blog.
He also writes his own amusing comments and observations.
sentences.chinese: 同时他还要写下自己原创的趣味点评。

sentences.english: Experts and professors from local universities evaluated their performances.
sentences.chinese: 来自北京高校的专家教授对他们的表现进行了点评。

sentences.english: All the people gave her pesto five star review.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人都给了她的香蒜酱汁五星级的点评。

sentences.english: The merger of Meituan and Dianping could herald a bigger consolidation.
sentences.chinese: 美团外卖和大众点评的合并可能预示着更大的合并。

sentences.english: Use a website to search for hair stylist reviews in your area.
sentences.chinese: 上网搜索你所在地区的发型师点评。

sentences.english: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey, Camden.
sentences.chinese: 点评罗格斯，新泽西州立大学，卡姆登校区。

sentences.english: So now, after Rockets 96, Nets 89, it has been 20 games.
sentences.chinese: 仅凭20场比赛来点评火箭似乎有点武断。

sentences.english: This composition method designed three students' comments on columns.
sentences.chinese: 本作文法设计了三个学生的点评栏目。

sentences.english: Let us know by leaving a comment below.
sentences.chinese: 可以在下面点评让我们知道你的意见。

sentences.english: Students : Read the article of 3a together.
sentences.chinese: 学生一起点评哪一组读的好，并指正。

sentences.english: The former Lazio President gave his judgements on various Italian football personalities, including Berlusconi and Moratti.
sentences.chinese: 拉齐奥前主席点评了一些意大利足球圈内的人物。

sentences.english: Once more, this article to "Teng Wangge Foreword" the teaching factual record carries on the review.
sentences.chinese: 再次，本文对《滕王阁序》的教学实录进行点评。

sentences.english: Since I already reviewed this, I will just point to the link.
sentences.chinese: 既然我已经点评过这首歌，我只放链接在这里。

definition: to comment/a point by point commentary
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
(after completing a game of chess) to replay the game, analyzing the players' moves/(stock market) to resume trading
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
